class.name: prx_planning/brute_force_manip_tp
class.description: A task planner for brute force multi-arm manipulation.

class.name: prx_planning/gmam_tp
class.description: A task planner for solving general many arm manipulation problems.

class.name: prx_planning/multi_modal_forward_tp
class.description: A task planner corresponding to the MM-PRM method by Hauser.

class.name: prx_planning/hand_off_sampler
class.description: A sampler which samples hand-off poses and arm configurations.

class.name: prx_planning/stable_pose_sampler
class.description: A sampler which samples stable poses and arm configurations.
